level.heading: Rental Accommodations Division of the Department of Housing and Community Development.
level.text: There is established within the Department of Housing and Community Development the Rental Accommodations Division, which shall have as its head a Rent Administrator.

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Merit system classification policy and grade levels, see § 1-611.01.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 42-3401.03, § 42-3501.03, and § 42-3502.04b.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 2003(c) of Fiscal Year 2008 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2007 (D.C. Act 17-74, July 25, 2007, 54 DCR 7549).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-10
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-10, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-3501.01.

level.heading: Termination of law Termination of Law 6-10
level.text: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-3502.01.
